column4: In hoary, after a fresh install and also after a while of running hoary, I notice a ~ dir is created IN my home dir.... so if I ls in my home dir I see a blue ~  if I open nautilus it doesn't show it, if I do anything to it, it screws up my home dir....what is it? is it a bug?
certainly a bug, hard to tell where though
you can operate on it without screwing up your home directory by using \~ rather than just ~
